Requirement You are under the effect of a meditation spell.

You perform the following as you Sustain your Meditation.

Make a Stealth check against the target’s Perception DC. This counts as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} check for any benefits you may have to Hide actions. On a success, a flicker of moon’s dark grips the target’s senses and you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to that creature, and on a critical success you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} instead. This effect lasts for 1 round, until you take a hostile action against that creature, or until they take a hostile action against you.

@Check[stealth,recitation|against:perception|options:action:hide]

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.classes.5OhGSmOaQxJao0iA]{Effect: Darkmoon}
